title: AMBITIOUS BUT RUBBISH
body:
Relatively new to league, started at the end of season 5.
JG {{champion:254}} and Top Lane {{champion:14}} {{champion:78}} are my preferences, but I'm willing to play Support.
Currently just want some casual fun, maybe something serious if the stars align.
Looking to get a ranked team going, currently unranked and doing poorly in solo queue , IRL friends aren't able to get a consistent team comp going, hopefully a coordinated team can change that, so voice chat (Be that skype, curse, or teamspeak) is a must.
Oh dear, this is sounding like a dating profile.

replies.body: i'll join but i do main top if thats k
